name: Drumpf Diplomacy
description:
Drumpf Diplomacy

-----------------------------------------------------

Game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

-----------------------------------------------------

You are US President Drumpf's newest intern and you must monitor his crazy and “out of control” tweets while trying to maintain all gauges as high as possible. Choose words wisely. Good Luck.

----------------------------------------------------

Made by :

Daniel Néphi Muller «Dorcan» - Coding and Game design
Johanna Pleineveaux - Game art, Writing and UI
Gabriel Loeffler «Darky» - Game art and UI
Jonathan Cornu «Orisue» - Writing and Game design
Luc Jolivet «Blubluble» - Sound design and music
